texts.text: For a guide about all content in this release and the other releases of 0.10, see Bedrock Edition guides/0.10 releases.

v0.10.0 alpha was a major update to Minecraft: Pocket Edition that was released on November 18, 2014. It added several new features such as the day/night cycle in Creative, 64-bit hardware support, new fence types, and other changes and fixes.
Compared to previous updates, 0.10 was more known as containing more changes than new features, generally due to bringing the game up-to-date with newer devices and running smoother.

1 Additions
1.1 General
1.2 Blocks
2 Changes
2.1 Sounds
2.2 General
2.3 World generation
2.4 Blocks
2.5 Mobs
2.6 Other
3 Fixes
4 References

Day/night cycle added in creative mode.
Adaptation for 64-bit hardware/software, making the game faster for 64-bit users.
Support for the resolutions of the iPhone 6.
Options:
Graphics
Brightness toggle

Fences and fence gates:
Spruce
Birch
Jungle
Acacia
Dark Oak

Graphics:
Converted to using OpenGL ES 2.0:
Shaders
Rounded, PC colored fog.
Version exclusive: Lighter and smoother water texture.
The Sun is now slightly larger.
The clouds and the terrain are now tinted blue during the night
Version exclusive: Smooth lighting on water.
Version exclusive: Swamp water is now dark gray
Version exclusive: The clouds and the terrain are now tinted red during sunset
Loading distant chunks now have a fading effect
Tinted lighting from PC.
Mipmaps on Android devices using OpenGL ES 3.0.
Made the chat smaller[1]

Mineshafts now spawn at the surface in mesas.
Gold ore can generate at any level in mesa biomes.
Huge mushrooms now spawn in swamps.

Sand
Now have falling dust particles when unsupported.
Red sand
Now have falling dust particles when unsupported.
Gravel
Now have falling dust particles when unsupported.

Version exclusive: Walking animations are generally faster and have been tweaked per-mob
Hostile mobs spawn in groups
Slimes now have bouncing animations.
Baby animals can swim without drowning

Interact button is now transparent
Optimized chunk rendering.
Improved Performance.
The time of day is now more accurately synced in multiplayer.
Added a selection overlay on chests and signs.
"Cancel" button will show up if joining a multiplayer world/server takes too long.
The outline of chat messages ends where the message ends and does not cover the whole screen.

Game freezes when an alert or different UI is opened (iOS)[2]
Fixed a crash when rendering monster spawners.
Fixed a crash/memory leak happening when showing the system keyboard - signs and chat. (iOS)
Fixed corruption and possible crash when switching apps. (Android)
Fixed the "spawning in the air" bug.
Fixed a crash when creating lava during world generation.
Fixed a white artifact on torches held in hand.
Fixed holes appearing in the clouds.
Fixed a brown artifact appearing on the bottom of minecarts.
Fixed a random crash in multiplayer.
Fixed a possible crash when selecting double chests.
Fixed water not pushing things.
Fixed incorrect damage for punching
Fixed black artifact on chickens
Fixed incorrect speed for cows
"I have added it to the list. :)" – @jbernhardsson on Twitter, September 11, 2014
